description: This file implements the PostMortem functionality within the WPEFramework plugin host namespace. It defines a static method that triggers a post-mortem dump depending on the context, either for internal or external processes, including system info dumping and signaling.

classes.name: Server
classes.description: A static utility class providing a method to trigger post-mortem collection

methods.name: void PostMortem(Service & service,const IShell::reason why,RPC::IRemoteConnection * connection)
methods.description: Handles the logic for generating a post-mortem report, either for internal plugins or external connections, including dumping system files and signaling remote connections.

ctags.name: PostMortem
ctags.pattern: /^\/* static *\/ void Server::PostMortem(Service& service, const IShell::reason why, RPC::IRemoteC/
